name: Small Saga (itch)
description:
Venture below the streets of London, and you will find the bustling kingdom of Rodentia, home to creatures great and small.
The mouse brothers Verm and Lance have heard rumour of a divine food hoard. But to reach it, they will have to venture through the territory of the lawless sewer rats...
This demo is just a snippet of what's to come.
~~~
Controls:
Arrow keys - MoveZ - ConfirmX - Cancel, open menu
~~~
Note: This demo requires WebGL to run. If you encounter graphic glitches, you may need to update your graphics card driver or web browser, or you may have to enable hardware acceleration in your browser settings.
The soundtrack and a Windows version of the demo are free to download below.
For updates, follow @Sketchy_Jeremy on Twitter or join us in the Discord channel.
Keep an eye out for the Kickstarter on the 4th of June!
